article_title: Trump trying to make America great again
article_text:

article_metadata.author: Pat Bushey

og.description: From his campaign's beginning, Donald Trump promised to bring America back to the great nation it was before the administrations, both Republican and Democrat, decided changes were needed.
og.title: Trump trying to make  America great again
